pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid: Final Stage (2017, stage show)$(br2)Used to craft Gamedeus Muteki's $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver_gamedeus_muteki)Gamer Driver (Gamedeus Muteki)$(/l)
